parameter.name: key
parameter.description: A map of attribute names to AttributeValue objects, representing the primary key of the item to delete.

parameter.name: tableName
parameter.description: The name of the table from which to delete the item.

parameter.name: conditionalOperator
parameter.description: A logical operator to apply to the conditions in the expected map.

parameter.name: conditionExpression
parameter.description: A condition that must be satisfied in order for a conditional DeleteItem operation to succeed.

parameter.name: expected
parameter.description: A map of attribute/condition pairs. This is the conditional block for the DeleteItem operation.

parameter.name: expressionAttributeNames
parameter.description: One or more values that can be substituted in an expression.

parameter.name: expressionAttributeValues
parameter.description: One or more values that can be substituted in an expression.

parameter.name: returnConsumedCapacity
parameter.description: Determines the level of detail about provisioned throughput consumption that is returned in the response.

parameter.name: returnItemCollectionMetrics
parameter.description: Determines whether item collection metrics are returned.

parameter.name: returnValues
parameter.description: Determines whether to get the item attributes as they appeared before they were updated.

parameter.name: responseVariable
parameter.description: The name of the variable to which the response should be stored.

parameter.name: overwriteBody
parameter.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the response of the operation.
